reviews.review: I didn't think I would enjoy this game due to how well I do puzzle (not well), but I really did enjoy this game. Pick it up and try it for yourself
It's a classic for a reason.
Incredible game! Great story, good voice acting, good puzzles, and a nice theory on portal guns.
Amazing game, amazing story, great physics
Es un juego genial, pero muy corto. Me encanto la cancion final.
One of the best games ever made. Around 3 hours of just fun, engaging, intriguing, humorous fun.  This IS worth your time, you owe it to yourself to play this. Enjoy.

seems like a demo to Portal 2, but a definate demo worth playing. Finished the game in 3 hours (a quarter of the time Portal 2 took).
It's a very good introductory to the series.
Very fun. Portals are a sick mechanic.

Originality is a great thing. And it confirms Portal. Great and entertaining puzzle game with great but really short story.

8/10

This game was short but sweet. I really liked the sci-fi aspects along with the whole creepy atmosphere. Portal did not disappoint.
One of the best games i've ever played, the 2nd one is better tho 8/10

Portal is one of my all time favorites. The atmosphere is just amazing! The story is simple but funny! The gameplay is a lot of fun and just the right amount of challenging. Portal 2 is even better, but play this one first!
I played this many times, and its really good game. What a masterpiece.

Just finished the game and this is [b] gold[/b]. The puzzles are challenging and awesome. Chamber 15 and a little part of Chamber 19 gave me a headache so i need to look the walktrough on youtube. I almost can't beat GLaDOS bcos i'm running out of time, but the satisfaction after i defeated her is priceless. Good Job Valve!
